trans-unit.source: This documentation shows how to create a 3-D game named Marble Maze that embraces new form factors such as tablets and also works on traditional desktop and laptop PCs.

trans-unit.source: Introducing Marble Maze
trans-unit.target: Introducing Marble Maze

trans-unit.source: We chose Marble Maze because it is relatively basic, but still demonstrates the breadth of features that are found in most games.
trans-unit.target: We chose Marble Maze because it is relatively basic, but still demonstrates the breadth of features that are found in most games.

trans-unit.source: It shows how to use graphics, input handling, and audio.
trans-unit.target: It shows how to use graphics, input handling, and audio.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates game mechanics such as rules and goals.
trans-unit.target: It also demonstrates game mechanics such as rules and goals.

trans-unit.source: Marble Maze resembles the table-top labyrinth game that is typically constructed from a box that contains holes and a steel or glass marble.
trans-unit.target: Marble Maze resembles the table-top labyrinth game that is typically constructed from a box that contains holes and a steel or glass marble.

trans-unit.source: The goal of Marble Maze is the same as the table-top version: tilt the maze to guide the marble from the start to the end of the maze in as little time as possible, without letting the marble fall into any of the holes.
trans-unit.target: The goal of Marble Maze is the same as the table-top version: tilt the maze to guide the marble from the start to the end of the maze in as little time as possible, without letting the marble fall into any of the holes.

trans-unit.source: Marble Maze adds the concept of checkpoints.
trans-unit.target: Marble Maze adds the concept of checkpoints.

trans-unit.source: If the marble falls into a hole, the game is restarted at the last checkpoint location that the marble passed over.
trans-unit.target: If the marble falls into a hole, the game is restarted at the last checkpoint location that the marble passed over.

trans-unit.source: Marble Maze offers multiple ways for a user to interact with the game board.
trans-unit.target: Marble Maze offers multiple ways for a user to interact with the game board.

trans-unit.source: If you have a touch-enabled or accelerometer-enabled device, you can use those devices to move the game board.
trans-unit.target: If you have a touch-enabled or accelerometer-enabled device, you can use those devices to move the game board.

trans-unit.source: You can also use an Xbox 360 controller or a mouse to control game play.
trans-unit.target: You can also use an Xbox 360 controller or a mouse to control game play.
